data.title: Sloppy Joe and Drink
data.text: Not able to fill order - requested sloppy joe took .5 hours to complete order after talking to owner.  Then owner complaned about my feet being on chair.      Was very surprised as I have been going there for several weeks and he indicated this has been going on several weeks.  Hmmm first I heard of any complaint.  But the way I have vericose veins.  Told him I would comply and that was the first I have heard of it.  Very dissapointed in his responce and think this is not a place that I would recommend to a friend.

data.title: Great Coney Joint
data.text: This is a very clean, fast and friendly restaurant. It is our go to place when we want a quick good meal.

data.title: Family Owned Resturant
data.text: Did a carryout. I called ahead and the order was ready when it was promised. Chicken breast, rice and salad was good. I will go back.

data.title: Late night
data.text:
A group of coworkers and I went for a light lunch on break on midnights. Very nice waitstaff and the food was delicious. Great prices
It's open 24 hours
They have carry out or dining and I will definitely be back

data.title: good food low prices
data.text: enjoyed the breakfast service was fast and prices very reasonable for 2 people under 12.00 dinner for 2 was under 15.00

data.title: Detroit style coney island restaurant with a cool 50's inspired decor
data.text: Tasty chili dogs and gyros highlight the menu in this cozy restaurant in the heart of Sterling Heights

data.title: So So Food & Service
data.text: I have been there a number of times in the past. The food was OK.... Awhile back I had their  fish and chips and the tartar sauce was very, very salty. The wait staff in none too friendly, and seems to want to be somewhere else. Food prices are a bit high.  I finally stopped going and now eat at Sterling Coney Island - which I cannot find the review page for.

data.title: Sunday morning breakfast
data.text: The food was good but the service wasn't .Waitresses seem more occupied with talking with friends/customers/other waitress at the counter. One kept showing pictures on her phone to a man in the booth across from me, he received two refills of coke. Not one of them ask if I would like more coffee. I had to go to the counter to ask for my bill to pay. Mind you there were 4 waitresses. ONE BIG GABFEST. Will go down the street next time to eat.

data.title: Worst Waitresses Ever
data.text:
Stopped in this restaurant for a dinner with my family. It was later in the evening and there was only one other couple in the restaurant. After bringing our food out the waitress never came back to our table to check on us. We had to stand up and wave to get her attention so we could get our drinks refilled. Then a couple days later my husband stopped in there for lunch with a couple colleagues from work. Same thing happened. Waitress drops food off and never comes back to check on their table. Waitress had to be waived down to come and refill drinks. 
We're not returning to that restaurant. There are plenty of similar restaurants in the area so save yourself the grief of having to have to flag down a waitress to get your drinks refilled. The food was nothing to write home about. This place also has carry out and a drive through window.
Garbage can was overflowing while the two waitresses were having a gab fest.
